title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine everything and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery and creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Make sauce with tomato puree, cream, and spices.
Add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick and colorful Asian-style beef and vegetable stir fry.
ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 2-inch strips
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium-high heat
add beef and stir-fry until browned, 3 to 4 minutes.
Stir beef into vegetables and season with soy sauce and sesame seeds
